root.name: getChild()

example.code:
size(100, 100)
states = loadShape("tristate.svg") ohio = states.getChild("OH") ohio.disableStyle()
background(0) shape(states, -48, 5) fill(102, 0, 0) shape(ohio, -48, 5)

root.description: Extracts a child shape from a parent shape. Specify the name of the shape with the target parameter. The shape is returned as a PShape object, or null is returned if there is an error.

parameter.label: sh
parameter.description: PShape: any variable of type PShape

parameter.label: index
parameter.description: int: the layer position of the shape to get

parameter.label: target
parameter.description: String: the name of the shape to get
